products.title: Oslo Blackout Snow White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo Blackout Snow White Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £7.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Oslo Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This brilliant snow white roller blind creates a light and airy look, so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric; to help blockout the light when desired.
 
 Product ID: DB-PRBX0040 Fabric Colour: Snow White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: ThermoBlock Blackout White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: ThermoBlock Blackout White Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £9.20 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our exclusive ThermoBlock range combines blackout and thermal properties in a range of soft neutral colours.
A white roller blind easily freshens up the space. Our ThermoBlock range is made from blackout fabric, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control. This white blackout roller also features a silver UV-reflecting backing, meaning your rooms are kept cool in summer and warm in winter, which means this roller is also great for hot offices or sunrooms. Roller blinds bring a contemporary and modern look to the space, and as all our blinds are child-safe, our roller blinds can be installed anywhere in the house!
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years' experience making blinds and curtains for homes up and down the country.  This white roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Konya Blackout Porcelain White
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blalckout Porcelain White Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Porcelain White Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Konya Blackout Chalk White
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Chalk White Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Chalk White Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Metz PVC Blackout Snow White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Metz PVC Blackout Snow White Roller Blind in White. Made to measure from £10.36 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The Metz PVC Blackout patterned range, changes colour shades when light hits it, and offers a wide array of colours to choose from.Waterproof and flame retardant, Metz fabrics are durable and practical.
This bright white, marbled, Snow White blackout roller blind is also great at blocking out light, so is a great option for rooms where screens feature, such as living rooms or offices, and due to it's waterproof fabric, is also a smart option for bathrooms or kitchens.
At Swift Direct Blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roller blind is made by our expert team, in our Yorkshire workshop, and comes with a FREE five year guarantee and customer-first aftercare.

products.title: Willow Blackout Birch White Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Willow Blackout Birch White Roller Blind in White/Grey. Made to measure from £15.76 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Soft, muted grey with wispy willow branches make a delicate Willow Blackout Birch White electric blackout roller blind choice for a bedroom or living area.  It blends well with most neutral décor and gives a feminine yet contemporary feel to your chosen space.  Finished with Pollergen™, it is a good option for hayfever sufferers as it neutralises pollen so reducing symptoms.  The electric operation is easy to use and the blind opens and closes at the touch of a button.
